DOC.brief_summary: This study aim verify mechanical clinical effect instrument massage myofascial trigger point trapezius muscle adult subject .
DOC.detailed_description: Background : There several therapy currently use treat myofascial trigger point , include conservative invasive technique . It show conservative technique include therapeutic massage , stretch , transcutaneal electrical nerve stimulation , spray stretch , cold laser treatment , ultrasound apply treatment myofascial pain syndrome , single strategy prove universally successful . Instrumented massage show clinical effectiveness shoulder pain , low back pain , one study ( case report ) myofascial trigger point . This study aim verify mechanical clinical effect instrument massage myofascial trigger point trapezius muscle adult subject . Methods/Design : The study include 31 volunteer myofascial trigger point right trapezius muscle . Clinical patient data obtain questionnaire , VAS , algometry , sono-myoelastography myotonometry . Also , physiotherapist grip strength measure . Subjects randomly allocate one two group : Instrumented massage Manual massage . The intervention consist single 20 minute session massage back neck therapist , depend group , massage apply manually instrument .
